Good luck today, Superwoman!!!
Message 1967 of 4024
Still open to helping with Max?
Sent:03/08/2024 at 10:36 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/08/2024 at 10:54 AM)
Subject:Re: Thoughts on Max (for tomorrow)
Message 1968 of 4024
I just chatted to him. He asked if 3 pick up works. Heâ€™s doing a movie marathon with max
Sent:03/08/2024 at 10:55 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/08/2024 at 10:57 AM)
Subject:Adrian
Message 1969 of 4024
So that is six hours off my day. And you are acting as the go-between for altering times with Adrain when you knew we had confirmed plans already.
They could also very well be in the boy cave I spent weeks and $$$ building for them, exactly for the sole purpose of "Movie Marathons" over here.
What would you propose as the best way for us to handle these situations together now that they have been created and will be very tough to unwind?
It's my time, and I have the perfect place. If you want them to have a good relationship with their father, I would hope you advocate for that instead
of this.
I don't care about the Parenting Plan violation, but I do want to get this right. I just resent the note about reunifying Max earlier. We talked about it
yesterday.
Are you going to foster and help enable a healthy and positive relationship between our children and me, or do you feel like this is a better course of
action?
Sent:03/08/2024 at 11:09 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/08/2024 at 11:13 AM)
Subject:Re: Adrian
Message 1970 of 4024
I asked Adrian and he was surprised for lunch pick up. I thought you aligned with him.
3pm was his ask.
We are navigating so I would appreciate if tone were moderated.
Sent:03/08/2024 at 11:17 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/08/2024 at 11:17 AM)
Subject:Re: Adrian
